title: Yemen's Deteriorating Stability Makes It A Perfect Home For Al-Qaida
teaser: David Greene talks to Danya Greenfield, deputy director of the Rafik Hariri Center for the Middle East, about al-Qaida's presence in Yemen and the nature of U.S. counterterrorism operations there.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
